channel.title: cshotton tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from cshotton.

item.description: @b05crypto Anyone flying there today? That's on every glider pilot's bucket list.

@MaxBoot @OlgaNYC1211 Say what you really mean. You want to abolish the Senate. Otherwise, what's the point of whining about proportional representation, since that's what the House already is? Or do you somehow think we should have TWO Houses? What would be the point of that?

@b05crypto @GOP It's just vanilla "White Christian Nationalism", not a theocracy. They still want all THEIR vices, just not yours or any for the brown people they hate. But now that they made it so everyone can carry a gun in their pocket, they may be have jumped the shark.
@sauldraws WTF is it? Never, ever heard of it. I think it might be one of those tricks your parents played on you as a child...

@tobsse @IuliiaMendel @IntelCrab @Schwarzenegger Well, who WILL you accept criticism from then? Because the criticism is valid, regardless of whether or not you consider him "European". As if that even matters.
@b05crypto It was the new carpet fumes....

@b05crypto When you have only a 2 year term and your employment prospects are constantly in jeopardy, your focus is only your own re-election. Constantly. Pandering becomes a way of life. Don't forget you're complaining about a fundamentally broken system.
@peternlewis OMG! That is the ONLY way I can use System Prefs now. This is the user hostility we have to look forward to? What kind of savage doesn't make an alphabetize option?
@biz84 What if Twitter just supported Markdown?

@peternlewis Better yet, it'll finally learn that when Mail cannot connect to GMail, it's not such an urgent emergency that it needs to seize control of the screen and bring itself to the foreground, regardless of what the user is doing.
@coreycottrell This was a really exciting demo and intro to Uplift World. Great show, @b05crypto and @coreycottrell !! I think there's a pony in here somewhere!

@rudytheelder Speaking of things you're reading, it's always fun to get the occasional peek at your reading list. Post some summer reading ideas if you have a sec. I just finished Dad's Nuke, which was, um, a blast.
@eervin1 Definitely got the plate wrong on the Mercedes. Wishful thinking, I guess.
@b05crypto When the Venn Diagram of gamers and crypto-bros are not concentric circles, you might get people to let go of Discord. (I agree, though, Discord is not pro grade gear.)
@b05crypto @pgpsam @SturdyFinance This sheds a little more light on the NY fossil fuel crypto mining ban. I guess it pays to actually read the legislation... https://t.co/RgPk4krqeo
@HMNDomains I want my free .hmn #nftdomain from @app_cortex and @ButterflyProto sent to 0xffecfd7b3e13cc3e59c0e747885b4626a7cd4aa7
